entry.title: Say Hello to Dr.Indy Cat
entry.content:
{% img left /images/octocat/dr-octocat.png 448 448 ‘Dr. Indy Cat’ %}

{{ post.title }}

I’ve been a fan of Indiana Jones and GitHub. So I made a request for my brother Huey and guess what he gave me. I just hope this artwork could be featured in the Octodex.

The Illustrator source file can be found at:

https://github.com/modology/octocats

Please Like or leave comments if you like it.
